title: Did 30,000 scientists declare climate change a trick?
subtitle: More than 30,000 people may have signed a petition challenging the validity of anthropogenic global warming, but one does not have to be a climate scientist, or even a practising world, to sign that document.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: 30,000 scientists have signed a petition on the grounds that there is no convincing scientific evidence of man-made climate change.
